category: Sports Instructor Qualification Committee Regulations/Article 11 (Meeting Minutes)
contents: Article 11 (Meeting Minutes) ① The chairperson shall record the following matters in the meeting minutes and keep them with the signatures of all attending members. 1. Meeting date, place, and agenda 2. List of attendees and attendees 3. Deliberation agenda, resolution details 4. Other necessary matters ② The chairperson shall summarize and disclose the contents of the meeting minutes in Paragraph 1. However, the committee may decide not to disclose the meeting minutes for a specific matter by specifying the reason.
